topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: lvacant
short_description: lvacant is an email autoresponder and vacation service with full LDAP capability for the postfix mailer. It is written in PHP so it is OS indipendent. It can log using the syslogd and it can replace the vacation command as well.
